facebook.title: Across the divide
facebook.summary: "Psychiatrists have long known that the illnesses of patients they see in the clinic cannot be broken down into discrete groups in the way that is taught at medical school. Symptoms overlap and flow across diagnostic boundaries. Patients can show the signs
